/api: API DOCs for PSIM Website Server API
/api/sale/:id: Get Sale By Id Admin Or StockManager
/api/deleteSale/:id: Admin or StockManager can delete a Sale. (DELETE request)
/api/sales: Get all sales Admin or StockManager
/api/editProfile/:id: User Edit details (email, firstname, lastname, username) by ID. (PUT request)
/api/editProfile/password/:id: User Change/Edit Password by ID. (PUT request)
/api/resetPassword/:id: User reset password by ID (For Admins who have submitted a forgot password request). (PUT request)
/api/user/:id: To get a users info by his/her id Only Admin
/api/users: To get all users Only Admin
/api/user/:id: To delete  users Only Admin (DELETE Request)
/api/purchase/:id/deliver: Change Status to Delivered by Admin
/api/purchase/:id: Get purchase by id by Admin
Delete purchase by id by Admin
/api/check-quantity: Check if stock is less than 50
/api/product/:id: To get a specific product by id
/api/addProduct: Admin StockManager can create/add a New Product (POST request)
/api/editProduct/:id: Admin StockManager can change/edit a Product by ID. (PUT request)
/api/deleteProduct/:id: Admin or StockManager can delete a Product. (DELETE request)
/api/product/history/:duration: To get history (duration can either be hourly,monthly or yearly)
/api/related-analysis: To get related analysis of producst Only Admin
/api/input-sale/:productId: For Cashier to input sold product Only Cashier
*: Every other route is invalid and doesn't exist
